pkgmetadata.longdescription: Kernel Adaptive Density Estimation and Regression // Implementation of various kernel adaptive methods in nonparametric curve estimation like density estimation as introduced in Stute and Srihera (2011) doi:10.1016/j.spl.2011.01.013 and Eichner and Stute (2013) doi:10.1016/j.jspi.2012.03.011 for pointwise estimation, and like regression as described in Eichner and Stute (2012) doi:10.1080/10485252.2012.760737.
